rules.description: FN Command h,enter to Option backspace,del
FN Command j,k,l,space to Option arrow keys
FN Command j,; to Option arrow keys
Command arrow keys exchanged with Option arrow keys
caps_lock -> control when held, escape when tapped.
spacebar -> fn when held, spacebar when tapped.
Use Delete as Move to Trash
Chrome: exchange ctrl and cmd click
Figma/Sketch: D to move ('drag') instead of Space
Figma/Sketch: E to measure ('exact') instead of Option
Exchange command q,w with ctrl q,w. ctrl q must be held down.
